headline: Ford’s China JV Talks Test Costs Tariffs And Valuation Outlook
summary: Ford Motor (NYSE:F) is in talks with Chinese automakers about potential joint ventures to build vehicles in the US and Europe. The company has held informal discussions with US officials about allowing Chinese brands to manufacture in the US under joint venture structures. Ford is also exploring a partnership with Geely in Europe while managing tariff related pressures and supplier disruptions, including supply chain fires. For you as an investor, this sits at the intersection of Ford’s...

headline: Rampant AI Demand for Memory Is Fueling a Growing Chip Crisis
summary: Since the start of 2026, Tesla Inc., Apple Inc. and a dozen other major corporations have signaled that the shortage of DRAM, or dynamic random access memory — the fundamental building block of almost all technology — will constrain production.  Cook warned it will compress iPhone margins.  Micron Technology Inc. called the bottleneck “unprecedented.”

headline: How GM, Ford, Stellantis stock performed this week
summary: General Motors saw its stock drop for the week, but Ford and Stellantis stock prices rose.

headline: Consumer Tech News (Feb 9-13): AI Energy Push, And Mixed Tech Earnings Dominate Headlines & More
summary: Amazon deploys 32 satellites, AI data centers face power scrutiny, and major tech earnings beat estimates as global markets digest space, energy, and semiconductor developments.
